message: Hi Bob! I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because I face 10% inflation each round while you don't, so I need a larger share to compensate for potential value loss.

Hi Alice, I understand your point about the inflation but I think 51/49 split is a fairer starting point. It acknowledges your disadvantage, but also ensures both of us have a substantial share of the money. What do you think?
